long_description: Exus snowboard boots from thirtytwo are a great choice for aspiring snowboarders looking for comfort while working towards taking their snowboarding to the next level. Intuition Ultralon(TM) liners with soft, triple-density EVA foam and foam overlays provide comfort, support and warmth close to the feet; liners are custom moldable. Lightweight molded EVA footbeds provide anatomic support, cushioning and warmth; plus, they retain 95% of their thickness over time and won't flatten out. Full-length lacing system with lace locks improves heel hold and overall fit. 3D molded tongues wrap feet for easy lacing, improved fit and solid heel hold; design allows you to vary the stiffness to customize the flex and improve responsiveness. Inner cuff lacing tightens easily with a single pull; lace locks keep laces secure, pull strap keeps laces straight and anatomic shape keeps heels down. thirtytwo Exus boots have durable, dual-density rubber outsoles that grip the snow and your board, and provide all-day support and comfort.
short_description: Exus snowboard boots from thirtytwo are a great choice for aspiring snowboarders looking for comfort while working towards taking their snowboarding to the next level.
